name: Trier and Company
description:
Trier and Company is a global, integrated communications agency. We combine content marketing, social media, and PR services to help technology companies build their brand and solve real business problems.
We have a deep bench and a broad range of skills and expertise, ensuring that we complement client teams in the most effective way possible. We help clients shape markets, outshine competitors and connect with the audiences and influencers who fuel business growth.
